variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
Health Research - Marshfield Clinic (HR_MC). May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems. No distribution to insurance companies.

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID used at the subject source

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Final affection status derived from electronic algorithm, but may have been superseded by the result of manual validation (if done).
variable.comment: The affection status was derived using an electronic algorithm with >95% PPV (Positive Predictive Value). Manual chart reviews were performed on a portion of the subjects, using the same diagnostic criteria as the original algorithm. If the result of the manual chart review did not match the electronic algorithm, the final value will reflect the manually derived status. Pages 1-11 of "Marshfield-CataractDefinition" document, provide algorithm for cataract detection.
